programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young “cloaking” dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip teaches Oh her version of kung fu so he can stand up to a bully/Oh finds a real wolf to teach him how to become a werewolf for Halloween.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Sherman brings back a giant man baby after he loses a neighbor's son in the WABAC; Blackbeard battles a bully pirate to get his mojo and beard back

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: After disobeying orders, Snotlout is expelled from the academy. Meanwhile, Alvin comes to Berk to make amends- but can he be trusted?

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Switzerland to get some chocolate for Whitebeard’s chocolate fondue fountain. In Switzerland they find Odlulu using the Vacuum Key to steal all the country's chocolate so she can win The Colossal Festival of Chocolate.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Ring My Bell When Casper encourages Quasi to go on strike from his thankless job as chore boy, Alder and Dash make Casper take his place. First Mate Casper When Cappy needs a first mate, Casper's the only one who's up to the challenge.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's the Toyland Circus and all the toys are rehearsing an act - all except Smartysaurus, who rushes away, apparently too shy to take part. Noddy has to find a way to help Smartysaurus find an act for the circus.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and all his friends are finding out about different animals, they charge around being a pride of lions, a tower of giraffes etc… until Zebby wonders what zebras do… together the animals discover that zebras stampede… which is great fun and very noisy!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring… He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julian’s new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fool’s Day fever

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Thinking he's allergic to Meatlug, Fishlegs gets hypnotized – and wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: As a Rumblehorn wreaks havoc on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick – who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: The Dragon Riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships – and to learn exactly what the ships are.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Heather joins the Dragon Riders, but it's not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about her true identity.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragon's Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress… who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a “former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility” using only the four phone calls they’ve been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it’s complicated when Tina’s new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez’s undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canada’s most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she’s not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Templeton’s hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Baby’s name.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Our team in Tampa is back at it; taking on their newest zombie flip, a 1920s bungalow in the trendy Seminole Heights neighborhood. The renovations needed for this home are extensive.

programme.title: Enlighten Your Life (S3)
programme.desc: Today's first up is the "Self-Renewal House," a 40-year-old apartment beautifully transformed! Next, we'll introduce the "Co-Living House," a new concept in housing that's becoming increasingly popular!

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: It's Seyun's birthday during their trip to Singapore. To celebrate, they decide to stay in a nice hotel for one night. But what consequences will Seyun’s statement bring?

programme.title: Maid For Revenge
programme.desc: A maid wakes up covered in blood beside her client's pool, with the owner dead in the water, her young son's son's life in jeopardy - and no memory of what has occurred.

programme.title: Abducted On Prom Night
programme.desc: A recently-divorced mother reluctantly allows her troubled daughter to attend prom - only to have her worst fears realised when the girl and her friends are taken hostage.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: Five celebrity friends go on a trip together but at each stop where it costs money, they will have to play games against each other to be exempt from paying. One final loser will cover the costs for all.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Homestay Week comes to an end and the couples travel back to Sydney for the penultimate dinner party of the experiment, where the group is rocked by a nude photo scandal.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: As the six remaining couples go into the final commitment ceremony, the fallout from Olivia sharing an OnlyFans photo of Domenica dominates the night.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: The five remaining couples enter a critical phase in the experiment. This week’s intense tasks see them completely analyse their relationships as their final vows are only days away.

programme.title: Airline Wars
programme.desc: Airline drama is at an all-time high and we've got the viral videos to prove it. See what happens when people are caught on camera acting up and acting out. We're headed for the not-so-friendly skies.

programme.title: Abducted On Prom Night
programme.desc: A recently-divorced mother reluctantly allows her troubled daughter to attend prom - only to have her worst fears realised when the girl and her friends are taken hostage.

programme.title: Maid For Revenge
programme.desc: A maid wakes up covered in blood beside her client's pool, with the owner dead in the water, her young son's son's life in jeopardy - and no memory of what has occurred.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: South Korean actor Kim Nam-gil embarks on a journey with his companion, Lee Sang-yoon. Their first destination is the Punch Bowl village, a place marked by the pain of the divided Korean Peninsula.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: The journey heads towards the picturesque water city of Chuncheon. Nam-gil and Sang-yoon meet a travelling doctor who works in remote villages without medical facilities and join him on his rounds.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy heads to Chicago to one of the oldest buildings, the Berghoff, famous for their beer and schnitzel. Then he's off to Husk in Nashville, where this spot is putting a unique spin on Southern Classics.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: It's make-your-own-takeout night and Rachael teaches us how to create her version of Khua Kling, a Thai stir-fry dish with ground beef, lime leaf and red curry paste, served with short-grain rice.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael demonstrates how easy it is to make flavourful Manila clams that can serve several people. She also cooks up a side dish of warm zucchini and corn salad with charred ciabatta bread.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael teaches us how to make an Israeli-inspired, tahini-based yoghurt sauce with harissa, served over charred chicken and family-style pitta.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Surf and turf is a great combination, but why not make it even better by serving it with tacos? Rachael shows us how to make the ultimate date-night combo of crab nachos and steak tacos.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)

programme.title: CSI S4 E21 - Turn of the Screws
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.desc: For thousands of years, people have believed in the existence of Satan, the embodiment of evil. Some believe he has the power to possess souls and create mayhem amongst humanity. But is Satan a myth?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Sunken ships filled with priceless cargo. Lost cities of gold. Ancient temples concealing untold riches. There's something about these hidden treasures that captures the human imagination.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: Marvin Glass oversees the creation of many of the most iconic toys of the 20th century. From chattering teeth to a legendary game based on a mouse trap, Glass pushes the boundaries of what a toy can be.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch (S1)
programme.desc: Andy and Paul partner with the Navajo Rangers and an experiencer with unprecedented access to forbidden land in Navajo Nation to hunt for evidence of Skinwalkers.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Ancient cultures around the world have aroused fascination and provoked fear with curses and objects used to conjure them, like tablets and stones. But is there proof that some might have actually worked?

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The twisted origin stories of some of history's most diabolically creative, and brutal, torture devices—from the Iron Maiden to the pear of anguish.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: The ancient Sumerians established the world's first civilisation, and they credited their achievements to their gods, the Anunnaki. But is it possible these powerful beings were extraterrestrial visitors?

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: Marvin Glass oversees the creation of many of the most iconic toys of the 20th century. From chattering teeth to a legendary game based on a mouse trap, Glass pushes the boundaries of what a toy can be.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Ancient cultures around the world have aroused fascination and provoked fear with curses and objects used to conjure them, like tablets and stones. But is there proof that some might have actually worked?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: For thousands of years, people have believed in the existence of Satan, the embodiment of evil. Some believe he has the power to possess souls and create mayhem amongst humanity. But is Satan a myth?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Sunken ships filled with priceless cargo. Lost cities of gold. Ancient temples concealing untold riches. There's something about these hidden treasures that captures the human imagination.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Facing soaring costs, mounting criticism, and a tight deadline, Walt Disney pushes the limits of technology to create the first full-length animated feature film.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Terrifying encounters at 40,000 feet. Pilot accounts of UFOs taking control of their aircraft. Entire jumbo jets disappearing into thin air. Pilots have experienced unexplainable events in the sky.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The Fellowship is certain that they're closer than ever to an offset chamber when the probe drilling operation in the garden shaft finally gets underway.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: As gator season comes down to the wire, Ashley and Anna try to evade poachers. Troy calls upon his decades of swamp wisdom to reclaim the lead in the competition.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Eustace and his neighbour train a stubborn stallion. Jake and his team of dogs successfully run off their first mountain lion of the season. Aron hunts for moose while Jen fishes for rainbow trout.

programme.title: FDR (Franklin D. Roosevelt)
programme.desc: Franklin Roosevelt overcomes crushing personal setbacks and leads the nation through the Great Depression with optimism, energy, and a firm belief that the only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

programme.title: Imortal (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Imortal refers to a love so great and so enduring, it defied conventions, tragedy and even the limitations of time.

programme.title: Itanong Mo Sa Buwan
programme.desc: Josie is not really a victim but Angelito's lover. He then declares they planned the whole thing to finance a new life together. Who is telling the truth?

programme.title: Psycho Sex Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose. And the victims have one thing in common --- they are all in the care of the same psychiatrist.

programme.title: Darna, Ang Pagbabalik (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: While trying to find her grandmother and little brother, Ding, Narda is viciously struck in the head and the stone that furnishes her power is stolen. Before the inevitable face-off with Valentina, Darna gains a new ally when she helps police lieutenant Max Ablan.

programme.title: Andrew Ford Medina ('Wag Kang Gamol!)
programme.desc: Andrewford Medina (Andrew E) and Jinglebert (Dennis Padilla) do odd jobs for a hotel. Andrew joins a rap competition where Gilbert challenges aspiring rappers and shows his idol who the real king of rap is.

programme.title: Pitong Gamol
programme.desc: They are uneducated but smart. They are orphans but the whole neighborhood is their family. Life treats them harshly but they survive.

programme.title: Oscar Ramos, Hitman
programme.desc: Oscar Ramos (Ramon Revilla) is a respected man in the community. He settles disputes and takes up the cudgels for the oppressed. He also has a secret -- an amulet that protects him from bullets. Will his amulet protect him when both the police and Ka Ernie's group hunt him down?

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Mahal Ko
programme.desc: The King of the Philippine Movies and the Star for All Seasons team up in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy. FPJ and Vilma Santos meet in the most bungling of situations and they become fast enemies.

programme.title: Pag-ibig Ko Sa Iyo'y Totoo
programme.desc: A police officer lost his partner and girlfriend on the job. To forget the tragedy, he accepted the offer to become the bodyguard of a rich, young singing star whose father he has rescued from kidnappers.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: This is the story of four women in the glamorous world of fashion, about their friendships, their loves, and their careers.

programme.title: Batang Lansangan
programme.desc: Simple as his dreams would be, Ronnie Ricketts is a typical auto mechanic who wants only a peaceful and plain life. But no matter how he tried to live the life he desires, still the rotten elements of the society keep running after him.

programme.title: Somewhere (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A popular singer who was also the daughter of a judge was kidnapped by a convict he once sentenced to jail. But the act of revenge reversed itself when Lorna fell in love with her kind and caring captor.

programme.title: The Lilian Velez Story, Till Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: She was a famous young soprano turned movie actress, while he was a former child actor trying to make it as a leading man. They made a good pair on the screen. He loved her and saw their team-up as salvation of his waning career. Unable to accept the truth, he stabbed her to death one evening.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: FRONTRUNNERS
programme.desc: Kobayashi Kunio is a celebrated bonsai artist working to secure the future of this traditional art form through outreach to children, and through efforts to protect the iconic shimpaku juniper.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Morita Hirokazu heads an NPO which collects used children's wheelchairs and sends them to physically disabled children overseas. He explains the system and its 20-year history, and what drives him.

programme.title: JAPAN DELISH 5min.
programme.desc: Japanese festival favorite, yakisoba! Noodles cooked in a special sauce. Enjoy local yakisoba from all over Japan!

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Summer Light Show
programme.desc: We venture to the outskirts of Edo just after sunset, where a group of women and children have come to a stream to enjoy a popular summer activity. What could they be looking for among the weeds?

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Detecting vulnerable plaques is now possible using the latest intravascular imaging technology. We focus on how this can help with early detection of heart disease and prevention of its recurrence.

programme.title: Special program
programme.desc: A wide range of topics featuring Japanese culture and society are introduced.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Designing Neighborhoods. Architects and artists work with landowners and local government to shape appealing neighborhoods with strong character. Explore this next-generation approach.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: In the Philippines, one woman has developed an advanced organic fertilizer made from food waste. She hopes her product can be a dual solution for issues of waste and poverty.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MY ECO-FRIENDLY FARM
programme.desc: A woman from France is now an organic farmer in Okuma Town, Fukushima Prefecture. The town was affected by the 2011 nuclear accident. She is working to change that image.

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Massage chairs.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Deep dives into cultural phenomena with Peter Barakan, a bilingual British broadcaster based in Japan since 1974. Each time, Peter himself discovers something new about Japan.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.desc: UNTOLD STORIES OF THE BATTLE OF OKINAWA: Women and Teens on the Frontline. 75 years after the battle that claimed the lives of over 120,000 locals, recently discovered documents reveal untold stories.

programme.desc: In Kumamoto, we meet people who cherish their ancestry and nature, such as a traditional inlay artisan, a group passing on the history of the building of an embankment, and a brown cattle breeder.

programme.title: Viewpoint Science

programme.title: YOKAI
programme.desc: In this episode, we pursue the shape-shifting trickster Mujina. This being associated with raccoon dogs is known on Niigata Prefecture's Sado island as both human and animal, yokai and deity.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Below your eyes is the Sea of Okhotsk in the season of drift ice. Climbers are scaling a huge icefall reaching 40 meters high.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Kyoto has about 2,700 temples that hold an array of Buddhist statues. Sculptors breathe life into these objects of worship.

programme.title: Ethical Every Day
programme.desc: Japanese firms are rethinking mass production and disposal. The world's third-largest clothing company is recycling and reusing used clothes. Plus, one firm is reducing e-waste and helping refugees.

programme.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Japan has a long history of natural disasters. BOSAI explores how to overcome them and save lives with the power of science.

programme.title: The Logic of Coastal Architecture
programme.desc: Niigata / Nishizawa Ryue (architect) In a coastal district, boat builders used their skills to make houses. Nishizawa considers how architecture is affected by a community's terrain and values.

programme.desc: Makassar is a marine city with rich Dutch history in Sulawesi, which loves its food namely beef and fish dishes.

programme.desc: Haywood’s leadership is called into question after a tragic shooting close to home, and her relationship with Suarez is put to the test.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 1
programme.desc: Eureka! We've found another 20 examples of modern innovations you just can't live without. We've got a belt for your booty, a robot that pours beer and an exciting new way to enjoy butter. Act now and we'll throw in our one of a kind cast, includingTodd Bridges, Jaimie Andrews, Brendon Walsh and John Enos.

programme.desc: After some concerning interactions in town, Clark is determined to protect his secret identity - a task complicated by Jonathan and Jordan.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 1
programme.desc: The White House senior members handle difficult situations.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 7
programme.desc: Craving a little motherly love, Sheldon competes with the gang for his mother's attention when she comes to visit. LAURIE METCALF reprises her role as Sheldon's mother, Mary.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 8
programme.desc: Amy is heartbroken when Bernadette and Penny go shopping for wedding dresses without her.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 7
programme.desc: After some concerning interactions in town, Clark is determined to protect his secret identity - a task complicated by Jonathan and Jordan.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 11
programme.desc: Leonard must face his fears after being contacted by his high school tormentor (guest star LANCE BARBER), while Penny realizes that she might have been a bully herself.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 11
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr try to warm up to strangers at a ski lodge and pull up a chair as uninvited guests at an Italian restaurant. And tonight's punishment takes the cake when the loser is the surprise entertainer at the wrong party

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 12
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr celebrate three years of embarrassing each other in this special anniversary edition. The guys reveal some never-before-seen bonus footage of their favorite moments from the vault.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 13
programme.desc: The guys have to keep a straight face as the other Jokers act out bizarre scenes, then they try to get an embarrassing word in edgewise with strangers at the park. And playtime is over for tonight's big loser when the punishment hits a little too close to home.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 1
programme.desc: The White House senior members handle difficult situations.

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the early 1960s, at the height of the Cold War, THE MAN FROM U.N.C.L.E. centers on CIA agent Solo (Man of Steel's Henry Cavill) and KGB agent Kuryakin (The Social Network's Armie Hammer). Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Taking place 10 years after his heroic defeat of the Kraken, Perseus (Sam Worthington) embarks on a treacherous quest into the underworld to rescue his father, overthrow the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 14
programme.desc: The guys bite off more than they can chew serving customers at a sub shop, and they team up at a food court to perform a mystery task based on ambiguous hints from their partner. Then, the guys need their memory to get them through a series of commands, and the loser doesn't have the stomach for tonight's punishment, as he experiences the painful pangs of parenthood.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 15
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr push all the wrong buttons at a video game store, try to rope rock climbers into repeating a bizarre word, and give away fake tickets to a flop of a show.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 9
programme.desc: Mystery is the name of the game as Brandon and Lori uncover a vintage machine filled with risqu� photos. It's tantalizing, but is it profitable? Then, our buyers lock horns in a bidding war over what could be priceless artwork. And it's every man forhimself when Jesse makes a blind bid that sparks a frenzy, all over an unopened locker.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 10

programme.title: The World This Week
programme.desc: Join host François Picard's and his team of Paris-based journalists, as they explore all of the week's most interesting and important news stories. Viewers can react to mentioned stories and the host reads their comments.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Watch the latest international top stories, The News every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences, analytics of key events all over the world, comments, hot topics of the day, reports.

programme.title: French Connections
programme.desc: French Connections revolves around France, its top stories and news, its experience in various spheres and cultural life, sport events, health care and education, cuisine and so much more. Find out what is like to live in France, get to know its regions, and feel the true taste of France.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Keep up with the latest news from all over the globe with Focus on France 24. Focus programme provides exclusive reports from Monday to Friday at 7.50 am Paris time. programme.desc: These episodes discuss about ways of sorting materials and describing them as solid, liquid or gas based on observable properties.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episode teach about the objects in the environment, its properties or attributes, its similarities and differences. These episodes also talk about letters and body parts and their uses.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss whole numbers up to 100, ordinal numbers up to 10th, money up to PhP100.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach rhyming words, greetings and leave-takings, and the different elements of a story.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala sa sarili bilang Pilipino gamit ang konsepto ng pagpapatuloy at pagbabago.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang paggamit ng magagalang na pananalita, pagsasabi ng mensahe, paksa o tema ng patalastas at kuwento. Tinuturo din ng mga palabas na ito ang tungkol sa pagsulat ng parirala at pangungusap.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 1000, ordinal numbers up to 20th, and money up to PhP100. These videos also teach addition of whole numbers up to 1000 including money.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about different sounds, the alphabet, elements of the story, and action words. These also discuss the use of proper and common nouns and a and an.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang kahalagahan ng kinabibilangang komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, iba't ibang bahagi ng aklat, diksyunaryo, at elemento ng kuwento. Ipinapakita rin dito ang pagbabasa at pagbabaybay ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach whole numbers up to 10 000, ordinal numbers up to 100th, and money up to PhP1000. These videos also teach addition and subtraction of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes discuss about writing different kinds of sentences, descriptive paragraphs, and diaries. These episodes also show how to use common and proper nouns, plural forms of regular and irregular nouns, and how to read words, phrases, and sentences with short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kinalalagyan ng mga lalawigan sa rehiyong kinabibilangan ayon sa katangiang heograpikal nito.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about ways of sorting materials and describing them as solid, liquid or gas based on observable properties.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng mga pangngalan at mga panghalip, pagsulat ng maikling tula, talata, at talambuhay. Matutuhan din dito ang pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, bar graph, pie graph, at talahanayan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about divisibility, order of operations, factors and multiples, and the four fundamental operations involving fractions.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on filling-out forms, inferring meaning of words, and composing coherent sentences.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-uusapan ang heograpiya, mga teorya ng pinagmulan ng lahing Pilipino upang mapahahalagahan ang konteksto ng lipunan at pamayanan ng mga sinaunang Pilipino at ang kanilang ambag sa pagbuo ng kasaysayan ng Pilipinas.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the properties of materials to determine whether they are useful or harmful. These episodes also explain that materials undergo changes due to oxygen and heat.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-uusapan ang mga kuwentong bayan, sanhi at bunga. Susuriin din dito ang mga dokyu-film at mga pananaliksik.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts of sets and the real number system.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about completing analogies, reading strategies, and identifying the genre, purpose, intended audience, and features of various text types. These also focuses on passive and active voice, past and past perfect tenses, and direct and reported speech.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa ugnayan ng kapaligiran at tao sa paghubog ng sinaunang kabihasnang Asyano.

programme.title: Grade 7 Science

programme.title: Grade 9 Math

programme.title: Grade 9 English

programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga pangunahing konsepto ng Ekonomiks bilang batayan ng matalino at maunlad na pang- araw-araw na pamumuhay.
